decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Materials</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Full details, with samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted, including bricks, zinc cladding, glazing, balustrade, and surface treatment, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to the commencement of any above ground construction works. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2c85d4de-7fff-3246-fbbf-0e0a46b19627"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Bicycle storage:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development, details of secure, accessible, on site bicycle storage facilities for nine bicycles, including layout, stand type and spacing, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Such details as approved shall be implemented prior to the first occupation of the development and shall thereafter be retained and maintained.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-1c09479c-7fff-2fff-8048-ff5ee769065c"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that adequate provision for the safe and secure storage of bicycles is made for future occupiers and in the interest of safeguarding highway safety.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Boilers</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Reason:<span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;REASON: To protect air quality and people’s health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum as a result of the development and to contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;To protect air quality and people’s health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum as a result of the development and to contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.</span><br></span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Waste/recycling</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to occupation of the residential units hereby permitted, details of an adequate storage provision for waste and recycling for each of the commercial and residential uses of the building shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. All waste shall be kept within the storage area other than on days of collection. The storage area shall be provided in full prior to the first occupation of the development and shall thereafter be retained and maintained.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2b6d5866-7fff-e8b3-2b1d-df34c6d9c11a"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.295; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that adequate provision for the safe and secure storage of refuse and recycling is made for future occupiers and that separate spaces are provided for the commercial and residential uses. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Construction</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;"><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;No development shall take place until a detailed Demolition and Construction Management Plan covering the specific matters set out below has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

a)
b)
c)

The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the approved details and measures relating to the specific matters set out above, which shall be maintained throughout the entire demolition/construction period.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">No development shall take place until a detailed Demolition and Construction Management Plan covering the specific matters set out below has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.<br><br>a) Details of temporary obstructions of the footway and carriageway on the A10 which must be kept to a minimum and shall not encroach on the clear space needed to provide safe passage for pedestrian nor obstruct traffic flow on the A10.&nbsp;<br>b) Details of vehicle parking during construction, including location and times periods permitted by existing on-street restrictions.<br>c)&nbsp;<span style="font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">No skips or construction materials shall be kept on the footway or carriageway on the TLRN at any time.</span><br><br>The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the approved details and measures relating to the specific matters set out above, which shall be maintained throughout the entire demolition/construction period.</span><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">REASON: In the interest of ensuring the development is constructed in a manner that would not cause harm to the existing highway safety and conditions in general.&nbsp;</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Detailed Drawings</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Detailed drawings and/or full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before work commences. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">i) Windows, including reveals (1:20);</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">ii) Doors, including reveals (1:20);</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">iii) Details of joints and interfaces with materials with doors/windows/sills (1:5 or 1:10)</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4c30f60d-7fff-eeb2-59b3-a536e6eadbf8"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Commercial courtyard – hours of use</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Use of the commercial courtyard at ground floor level hereby permitted may only be carried out between 07.00 hours and 22.00 hours on any day. No amplified music or other sound shall be played in this area at any time.&nbsp;</span></p><p>REASON: To ensure that the use is operated in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally<br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline;">Soundproofing&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Soundproofing shall be provided to ensure that the hereby approved residential units shall receive a minimum airborne sound insulation on the party element which achieves:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">- 35 dB LAeq 16 hour (07:00 - 23:00) Living Rooms &amp; Bedrooms - daytime</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">- 30 dB LAeq 8 hour (23:00 - 07:00) Bedrooms - night time</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">- 45 dB LAmax 8 hour (07:00 - 23:00) Bedrooms - night time</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cc6196de-7fff-60e8-5782-3da2351fd411"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the occupiers do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise disturbance given the proximity to the railway station and commercial uses in the ground floor of the building.</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Odour Management Plan</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">Prior to occupation of the commercial premises hereby permitted an Odour Management Plan, setting out cleaning, maintenance and filter replacement for the flue system serving No.61 shall be submitted to and approved in writing, by the Local Planning Authority. The plan shall include a written recording system to record and demonstrate when all such work is carried out which shall be made available upon request by the Local Planning Authority. The approved odour management plan shall be complied with throughout the duration of the use of the equipment.&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure the amenity of neighbouring occupiers is safeguarded in respect of odour.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Swifts:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of 2 Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span></p><p>REASON: in the interests of biodiversity.<br></p>
description: Ground, first and second floor rear extension, first floor "infill" extension to 59 Kingsland High Street, rooftop extension to create a new fourth floor, amendments to basement layout and conversion of upper floors to provide a total of five new residential units (use class C3) (2 x 1 bed and 3 x 2 bed) with new refuse and cycle storage and associated works.
